description: Try our easy to follow Perfectly Balanced Beef, Sweet Potato & Kale Meatballs with Quinoa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Meatballs,Roast,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Beef,Wheat free,Sweet potato,Kale,Cauliflower,Dairy free
name: Perfectly Balanced Beef, Sweet Potato & Kale Meatballs with Quinoa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pkt beef, sweet potato & kale meatballs

recipeInstructions.text: Cook quinoa according to directions on pack and set aside to cool.
Put cauliflower and sweet potato in a roasting tray, toss in olive oil and curry powder. Cook for 20 – 25 minutes.
Meanwhile put the meatballs on a separate tray. Cook for 15 minutes or until cooked through.
Mix quinoa, cauliflower, sweet potato and the meatballs. Add lime juice to taste. Garnish with sultanas and pistachios.
